system.description: Starting at 18th level your understanding of your bonded artifact allows you to surpass even its already formidable intended capabilities. When you learn a spell using your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ctj5fxgrrxqcu2v6]{Enigma Tinkering} feature, you may select spells from any class spell list, instead of only selecting from the wielder spell list. Spells you learn in this way are treated as wielder spells for you.
